title: The Ability to Make Town!? ~Let’s Make a Japanese Town in Different World~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Beastkin   Betrayal   Death of Loved Ones   Demi-Humans   Domestic Affairs   Enemies Become Allies   Farming   Friends Become Enemies   Game Elements   Gods   Kingdom Building   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Management   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Multiple Transported Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Technological Gap   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars
author: Runpa Runpa   ルンパルンパ
description:
One day, a train accident occurred in the morning. It was the start of everything. The people who were riding on it were invited into a white space. What awaited them there was an old man who claimed to be god.

The old man said:

—- I will transfer you guys to a different world.

—- I will give you a power to help you survive.

Several hundreds of cards facing down appeared in the mid air.

When a certain male student drew his card, what was written was [Spear Talent] [Great] [★★★]. When a female student drew her card, what was written was [Talent of Water System Magic] [Small] [★★]

And the card that a certain man drew…

What Fujiwara Nobuhide, a trivial temporary employee drew, was [The ability to make a town] [★★★★★★★★★★].

This is story of a certain man who has the ability to make a town in a different world. At first, it started as something like Edo from the Tokugawa Period. However, my goal is a modern city. I’ll do my best!>
